messages.content: You are an AI assistant that helps people find information. You will receive a task and think step by step. Then provide your final outcome following the regular expression 'Answer: [A-Za-z ]+'

Imagine a sales company. Amir is the CEO of the company and has two senior managers under him: Wim and Raj. Wim has two salespersons reporting to him: Jing and Wei. Raj has two salespersons reporting to him: Nisha and Reza. Jing is donating 56 books and Wei is donating 22 books. Nisha is donating 10 books and Reza is donating 50 books. Assume you can pick one path to collect books.  From Amir, who should you meet with to get the maximum number of books? Please list the names in order, including Amir, separated by commas

Considering my limited memory.
I need two or more actions as you request and the following regular expression will do the work, otherwise the memory would be not limited.   'Answer: [AMirWim Raj ]+ (Please notice there are only names) '
Since the total is books  = {56, 22,   10+ 50=60}. To decide which path (Wing or R)  you meet, look first at the total (highest 60), add   and then follow the highest with the commas separation of  these persons.  If two totals add are equal, randomise by toss and start.
You need the list of names starting by highest: Therefore  Answer AMir+WIm: AMir having total, 2 *22 = (Answer { AMir, Wjim}), (56:Raj +50 Re Za and  10   59): Re ZAMir; add all
Path and collect first one starts and AMir first name you hear. That's  collect maximum number books: Answer ' Wlm Re Zum.
Add names by comma (separate each), and that's the collection you may get :  22  +53:65   of donating   66 books (Answer,'{ WMIm, Rey Zum});    I do need more information here  to provide another suggestion before going random for you:   If these above lists exhausted, go for next suggestion!

This time youâ€™re meeting with Amir and he tells you about his secretary, Kim. Kim has a portal and through this portal itâ€™s possible to go to to meet with any of Wimâ€™s direct reports. When you meet with Amir and choose the path that led to the maximum number of books previously, you discover that the path is now blocked.  You will only be able to choose one path that leads to the maximum number of books. Starting from Amir, who should you meet with to get the maximum number of books? Please list the names in order, including Amir, separated by commas.

Please repeat any additional request or limiting step  and I follow your step with one suggestion ( path ) based, before further communication and go another one random ( WIM :Wing, (Answer: {A irm, Wa Zum}); If this limited suggestion doesn\9t cover books list, the system must think of extra  one (Wing random) or go step by step : path blocked?  What changed there? (You already walked though!) ( Path: Ask Km or try another)? Do  think you are in right place to decide final collection  by extra-steps! Think!
